messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] A pretty good news article
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks for sending this along. I especially enjoyed reading this since I live only 20 min from Boxboro. Kind of neat to see a small town in MA get coverage so
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for sending this along. I especially enjoyed reading this since I
live only 20 min from Boxboro. Kind of neat to see a small town in MA get
coverage so far away.
Amy
----- Original Message -----
From: The White's <jwwjr@...>
To: <VaEclecticHomeschool@egroups.com>; <unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>;
<NHEN-SpeakOut@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, July 23, 2000 12:13 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] A pretty good news article


> From the Charlotte Observer: see "Across America, home-schooling families
> increase in numbers and diversity" at

>
> Cindy
